verses.verse: And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H4729>burn<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> upon: of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> it.

A <S%H520>cubit<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof; <S%H7251>foursquare<s%> shall it be: and two <S%H520>cubits<s%> shall be the <S%H6967>height<s%> thereof: the <S%H7161>horns<s%> thereof shall be of the same.

And thou shalt <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, the <S%H1406>top<s%> thereof, and the <S%H7023>sides<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and the <S%H7161>horns<s%> thereof; and thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> unto it a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> to it under the <S%H2213>crown<s%> of it, by the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6763>corners<s%> thereof, upon the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6654>sides<s%> of it shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> it; and they shall be for <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H905>staves<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> it <S%H1992>withal<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>vail<s%> that is by the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> that is over the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, where I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with thee.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> thereon <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%>: when he <S%H3190>dresseth<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%>, he shall burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> upon it.

And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5927>lighteth<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>, he shall burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> upon it, a <S%H8548>perpetual<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

Ye shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> no <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> thereon, nor burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%>, nor meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>; neither shall ye <S%H5258>pour<s%> drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> thereon.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of it <S%H259>once<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> of <S%H3725>atonements<s%>: <S%H259>once<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> shall he make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> upon it throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>: it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

When thou <S%H5375>takest<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> after their <S%H6485>number<s%>, then shall they <S%H5414>give<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for his <S%H5315>soul<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when thou <S%H6485>numberest<s%> them; that there be no <S%H5063>plague<s%> among them, when thou <S%H6485>numberest<s%> them.

This they shall <S%H5414>give<s%>, every one that <S%H5674>passeth<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> them that are <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, <S%H4276>half<s%> a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>: (a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%>:) an <S%H4276>half<s%> <S%H8255>shekel<s%> shall be the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Every one that <S%H5674>passeth<s%> among them that are <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>above<s%>, shall <S%H5414>give<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

The <S%H6223>rich<s%> shall not give <S%H7235>more<s%>, and the <S%H1800>poor<s%> shall not give <S%H4591>less<s%> than <S%H4276>half<s%> a <S%H8255>shekel<s%>, when they <S%H5414>give<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3725>atonement<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and shalt <S%H5414>appoint<s%> it for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>; that it may be a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls<s%>.
¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thou shalt also <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3595>laver<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and his <S%H3653>foot<s%> also of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, to <S%H7364>wash<s%> withal: and thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> it between the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> therein.
For <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet<s%> thereat:

When they <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, they shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%>, that they <S%H4191>die<s%> not; or when they come <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%>, to burn <S%H6999>offering<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>:

So they shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet<s%>, that they <S%H4191>die<s%> not: and it shall be a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> to them, even to him and to his <S%H2233>seed<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
¶ Moreover the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3947>Take<s%> thou also unto thee <S%H7218>principal<s%> <S%H1314>spices<s%>, of <S%H1865>pure<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels, and of <S%H1314>sweet<s%> <S%H7076>cinnamon<s%> <S%H4276>half<s%> so <S%H4276>much<s%>, even two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> shekels, and of <S%H1314>sweet<s%> <S%H7070>calamus<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> shekels,
And of <S%H6916>cassia<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels, after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> an <S%H1969>hin<s%>:

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> it an <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>ointment<s%>, an <S%H7545>ointment<s%> <S%H4842>compound<s%> after the <S%H4639>art<s%> of the <S%H7543>apothecary<s%>: it shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> therewith, and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>,
And the <S%H7979>table<s%> and all his <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> and his <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%>,
And the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> with all his <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and his <S%H3653>foot<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them, that they may be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>: whatsoever <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> them shall be <S%H6942>holy<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> them, that they may minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> unto me throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

Upon <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall it not be <S%H3251>poured<s%>, neither shall ye <S%H6213>make<s%> any other like it, after the <S%H4971>composition<s%> of it: it is <S%H6944>holy<s%>, and it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto you.

<S%H834%H376>Whosoever<s%> <S%H7543>compoundeth<s%> any like it, or whosoever <S%H5414>putteth<s%> any of it upon a <S%H2114>stranger<s%>, shall even be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> unto thee sweet <S%H5561>spices<s%>, <S%H5198>stacte<s%>, and <S%H7827>onycha<s%>, and <S%H2464>galbanum<s%>; these <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H5561>spices<s%> with <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%>: of <S%H905>each<s%> shall there be a <S%H905>like<s%> weight:

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> it a <S%H7004>perfume<s%>, a <S%H7545>confection<s%> after the <S%H4639>art<s%> of the <S%H7543>apothecary<s%>, <S%H4414>tempered<s%> together, <S%H2889>pure<s%> and <S%H6944>holy<s%>:

And thou shalt <S%H7833>beat<s%> some of it very <S%H1854>small<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> of it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, where I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with thee: it shall be unto you <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

And as for the <S%H7004>perfume<s%> which thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%>, ye shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> to yourselves according to the <S%H4971>composition<s%> thereof: it shall be unto thee <S%H6944>holy<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
<S%H834%H376>Whosoever<s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> like unto that, to <S%H7306>smell<s%> thereto, shall even be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
